IR-ID-01.description: Determine the extent of the incident and affected assets.
IR-ID-01.implementation_guidance: Review email headers, affected accounts, and timestamps.
IR-ID-01.risk_if_skipped: Misjudging scope may lead to incomplete containment.

IR-CON-02.description: Prevent further misuse of exposed credentials.
IR-CON-02.implementation_guidance: Temporarily disable the account and reset credentials.
